SELECT a.*,(SELECT b.account from fm_user b WHERE b.id = a.agent_id) as agent_account FROM fm_profit a LEFT JOIN fm_merchant b ON a.account = b.account
b.agent_id = #{agentId} AND a.agent_id = b.agent_id
and DATE_FORMAT(a.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT t2.account AS agent_account, t2.full_name AS agent_name, t2.reg_name as cmer, t1.* FROM fm_profit t1 LEFT JOIN fm_user t2 ON t1.agent_id = t2.id
agent_id in (SELECT a.id FROM fm_user a LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,parent_id , @pathnodes:= IF( parent_id =-1,',0', CONCAT( CONCAT_WS(',',IF(LOCATE( CONCAT('|',parent_id,':'),@pathall) > 0 , SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(@pathall,CONCAT('|',parent_id,':'),-1),'|',1) ,@pathnodes),parent_id),',',id))paths ,@pathall:=CONCAT(@pathall,'|',id,':', @pathnodes ,'|') pathall FROM fm_user,(SELECT @le:=0,@pathlevel:='', @pathall:='',@pathnodes:='') vv) b ON a.id = b.id where b.paths like '%,${agentId}%')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.ID, a.ORDER_ID, a.ACCOUNT, c.cmer AS MERCHANT_NAME, c.real_name, c.wx_rate AS wxRate, c.ali_rate AS aliRate, c.unipay_rate AS unipayRate, a.AMOUNT, a.TOTAL_PROFIT, a.AGENT_ID, b.full_name AS AGENT_NAME, b.account AS AGENT_ACCOUNT, a.AGENT_PROFIT, a.TJ_PROFIT, (SELECT m.real_name FROM fm_merchant m WHERE m.id = a.TJ_ID) as TJ_NAME, a.ORDER_DATE, a.JS_DATE, a.CREATE_DATE FROM fm_profit a LEFT JOIN fm_user b ON a.agent_id = b.id LEFT JOIN fm_merchant c ON c.account = a.account
and a.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
AND a.agent_id in ( SELECT a.id FROM fm_user a LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,parent_id , @pathnodes:= IF( parent_id =-1,',0', CONCAT( CONCAT_WS(',',IF(LOCATE( CONCAT('|',parent_id,':'),@pathall) > 0 , SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(@pathall,CONCAT('|',parent_id,':'),-1),'|',1) ,@pathnodes),parent_id),',',id))paths ,@pathall:=CONCAT(@pathall,'|',id,':', @pathnodes ,'|') pathall FROM fm_user,(SELECT @le:=0,@pathlevel:='', @pathall:='',@pathnodes:='') vv) b ON a.id = b.id where b.paths like '%,${agentId}%' )
and DATE_FORMAT(a.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{orderDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
